document.full_text: the mariners are in last place, and their offense is feeble. but optimism reigns, largely because of michael pineda, a 22-year-old strike-thrower.
document.title: at 96 m.p.h., pitcher gives the mariners added hope
lines_and_colors: the mariners are in last place, and their offense is feeble. but optimism reigns, largely because of michael pineda, a 22-year-old strike-thrower.
